page.title: 07Home Life-Hemsworth
page.content: There was a knock at the door;It was Debbie our next door neighbour.She asked if we would baby sit for her.I said yes.At 6 p.m. the baby started to cry so I gave it it's dummy but it spat it out,so I thought that he wanted his bottle.This was made up and given to him.My mum then told me to lay him done to sleep.I took upstairs to his cot and then sneaked back down stairs again.I sat down to watch the "Price is Right".Suddenley the lights went off and the television too.So my mum got a 50 pence piece off the cornish and put it in the electricity meter.Everything came back on again
